name: 250 LPH RO System

stagesOfFiltration: Pre-Filter: Removes larger particles like sand, silt, and dirt.
Activated Carbon Filter: Removes chlorine, bad taste, and odor.
RO Membrane: Removes dissolved salts, heavy metals, and impurities.
Post-Carbon Filter: Polishes the water for taste and purity.
specifications.pump: High-pressure pump to force water through the RO membrane.
specifications.controlPanel: Digital control panel for monitoring and operation.
specifications.pressureGauges: To monitor the pressure in the system.
specifications.flowMeters: To measure the flow rate of the product and reject water.
specifications.frame: Stainless steel frame for durability and hygiene.
specifications.autoShutOff: Automatically shuts off the system when the tank is full.
specifications.powerConsumption: Typically around 1.5-2.5 kW depending on the model.

benefits: High Capacity: Ideal for small to medium-sized businesses, offices, schools, and industries.
Pure Water: Provides high-quality, pure, and safe drinking water by removing up to 99% of contaminants.
Cost-Effective: Reduces the cost of purchasing bottled water.
Environment-Friendly: Decreases the use of plastic bottles, reducing environmental waste.
Improved Taste: Enhances the taste of water by removing chlorine and other contaminants.
Health Benefits: Removes harmful chemicals and microorganisms, providing safer water for consumption.
Easy Maintenance: Designed for easy operation and maintenance with readily available replacement parts.
Compact Design: Space-saving design suitable for various installations.
description: This 250 LPH RO system is a robust and efficient solution for providing a consistent supply of clean and safe water in various settings.
